verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- his own דִּגְל֤וֹ <S%H1714><s%> dig-Lo by his own standard בְאֹתֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> ve-'o-Tot with the ensign לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam, of their father's יַחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> ya-cha-Nu shall pitch בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מִנֶּ֕גֶד <S%H5048><s%> min-Ne-ged far off סָבִ֥יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv about לְאֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> le-'o-hel- the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <S%H2583><s%> ya-cha-Nu. shall they pitch

וְהַחֹנִים֙ <S%H2583><s%> ve-ha-cho-Nim pitch קֵ֣דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah And on the east side מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, toward the rising דֶּ֛גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel of the sun shall they of the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> nach-Shon and Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the children עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> 'am-mi-na-Dav. of Amminadab

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four וְשִׁבְעִ֛ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im seventy אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> ve-Shesh and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred

וְהַחֹנִ֥ים <S%H2583><s%> ve-ha-cho-Nim And those that do pitch עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh next unto him [shall be] the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char; of Issachar וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the son יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char, of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> ne-tan-'El and Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the children צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> tzu-'Ar. of Zuar

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-Dav; and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעָ֧ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah and four וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred ס sa-Mek

מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh [Then] the tribe זְבוּלֻ֑ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun; of Zebulun וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si [shall be] captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the son זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av and Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the children חֵלֹֽן׃ <S%H2497><s%> che-Lon. of Helon

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-Dav; and those that were numbered שִׁבְעָ֧ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah and seven וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim thereof [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <S%H6485><s%> hap-pe-ku-Dim All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> le-ma-cha-Neh in the camp יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מְאַ֨ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'At [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> u-she-mo-Nim and fourscore אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְשֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <S%H8337><s%> ve-she-shet- and six אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba'- and four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> ri-sho-Nah These shall first יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> yis-Sa-'u. set forth ס sa-Mek

דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֧ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp רְאוּבֵ֛ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben תֵּימָ֖נָה <S%H8486><s%> tei-Ma-nah On the south side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; according to their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <S%H468><s%> 'e-li-Tzur [shall be] Elizur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <S%H7707><s%> she-dei-'Ur. of Shedeur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדָ֑יו <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-Dav; and those that were numbered שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im thereof [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred

וְהַחוֹנִ֥ם <S%H2583><s%> ve-ha-cho-Nim And those which pitch עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh by him [shall be] the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on; of Simeon וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <S%H8017><s%> she-lu-mi-'El [shall be] Shelumiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צוּרִֽי־ tzu-ri- שַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H6701><s%> shad-Dai of Zurishaddai

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <S%H8672><s%> tish-'Ah and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim of them [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-Losh and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred

וְמַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> ve-mat-Teh Then the tribe גָּ֑ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad; of Gad וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad, of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> 'el-ya-Saf [shall be] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H7467><s%> re-'u-'El. of Reuel

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah and five וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im of them [were] forty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> ve-Shesh and six מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּֽׁים׃ <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim. and fifty

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <S%H6485><s%> hap-pe-ku-Dim All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> le-ma-cha-Neh in the camp רְאוּבֵ֗ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben מְאַ֨ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'At [were] an hundred אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְאֶחָ֨ד <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad and one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba'- and four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies וּשְׁנִיִּ֖ם <S%H8145><s%> u-she-ni-Yim in the second rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> yis-Sa-'u. And they shall set forth ס sa-Mek

וְנָסַ֧ע <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-Sa' shall set forward אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> 'o-hel- Then the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh with the camp הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim of the Levites בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst הַֽמַּחֲנֹ֑ת <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Not; of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher as they יַחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> ya-cha-Nu as they encamp כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יִסָּ֔עוּ <S%H5265><s%> yis-Sa-'u, so shall they set forward אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do in his place לְדִגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1714><s%> le-dig-lei-Hem. by their standards ס sa-Mek

דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel [shall be] the standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam according to their armies יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah; On the west side וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> 'e-li-sha-Ma' [shall be] Elishama בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <S%H5989><s%> 'am-mi-Hud. of Ammihud

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im of them [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred

וְעָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> ve-'a-Lav Next מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh And by him [shall be] the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H1583><s%> gam-li-'El [shall be] Gamaliel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <S%H6301><s%> pe-da-h-Tzur. of Pedahzur

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered שְׁנַ֧יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim and two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> u-ma-Ta-yim. and two hundred

וּמַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> u-mat-Teh Then the tribe בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the sons בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <S%H27><s%> 'a-vi-Dan [shall be] Abidan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <S%H1441><s%> gid-'o-Ni. of Gideoni

וּצְבָא֖וֹ <S%H6635><s%> u-tze-va-'O And his host וּפְקֻדֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6485><s%> u-fe-ku-dei-Hem; and those that were numbered חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah and five וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim of them [were] thirty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba' and four מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred

כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- that הַפְּקֻדִ֞ים <S%H6485><s%> hap-pe-ku-Dim All that were numbered לְמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> le-ma-cha-Neh of the camp אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim מְאַ֥ת <S%H3967><s%> me-'At [were] an hundred אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁמֹֽנַת־ <S%H8083><s%> u-she-mo-nat- and eight אֲלָפִ֥ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand וּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'Ah and an hundred לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; throughout their armies וּשְׁלִשִׁ֖ים <S%H7992><s%> u-she-li-Shim in the third rank יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> yis-Sa-'u. And they shall go forward ס sa-Mek

דֶּ֣גֶל <S%H1714><s%> De-gel The standard מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh of the camp דָ֛ן <S%H1835><s%> dan of Dan צָפֹ֖נָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah [shall be] on the north side לְצִבְאֹתָ֑ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam; by their armies וְנָשִׂיא֙ <S%H5387><s%> ve-na-Si and the captain לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan, of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H295><s%> 'a-chi-'E-zer [shall be] Ahiezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H5996><s%> 'am-Mi-shad-Dai. of Ammishaddai
